description.english: Making a wish to the Lamp God for leaving with treasure in Snow Mountain
description.schinese: 在雪山寻宝中，向灯神许愿带着财宝离开。

description.english: Waiting for body recovering and taking out the gem in Snow Mountain
description.schinese: 在雪山寻宝中，等待身体恢复后取出山中宝石。

description.english: Making barbecue brother with Eagle in Snow Mountain
description.schinese: 在雪山寻宝中，跟老鹰成功成为烧烤兄弟。

description.english: Taking Santa's sleight to leave in Snow Mountain
description.schinese: 在雪山寻宝中，搭乘圣诞老人的雪橇车离开。

description.english: Making a wish to the Lamp God for leaving with hunter in Snow Mountain
description.schinese: 在雪山寻宝中，跟猎人一起向灯神许愿离开。

description.english: Finding glod under the huge rock in Undersea Exploration
description.schinese: 在海底探险中，发现海底巨石下的黄金。

description.english: Summoning the dragon and riding it to leave in Undersea Exploration
description.schinese: 在海底探险中，召唤神龙并骑乘神龙离开海底。

description.english: Getting the pearl treasure of mermaid kingdom in Undersea Exploration
description.schinese: 在海底探险中，获得美人鱼王国中的珍珠宝藏。

description.english: Escaping from the whale body with its sneeze in Undersea Exploration
description.schinese: 在海底探险中，利用鲸鱼的喷嚏，逃离鲸鱼体内。

description.english: Through the test of the pirates and get the treasure in Undersea Exploration
description.schinese: 在海底探险中，通过海贼亡灵的考验，获得宝藏。

description.english: Landing on the shoot range and finishing eating chicken in Eating Chicken
description.schinese: 在吃鸡篇中，降落靶场并完成吃鸡。

description.english: Landing on P city and finishing eating chicken in Eating Chicken
description.schinese: 在吃鸡篇中，降落P城并完成吃鸡。

description.english: Sneaking attack the enemies with auspicious clothes to finish eating chicken in Eating Chicken
description.schinese: 在吃鸡篇中，身穿吉利服偷袭敌人吃鸡。

description.english: Driving a motorcycle to finish eating chicken in Eating Chicken
description.schinese: 在吃鸡篇中，驾驶摩托车完成吃鸡。

description.english: Finishing all the endings in Eating Chicken
description.schinese: 完成吃鸡篇中所有结局。

description.english: Finishing the adventure of returning home and reunion with family in Spring Festival
description.schinese: 在春节特别篇中，完成归乡奇遇并与家人团圆。

description.english: Finishing the new year embarrassment and stay at home with parents in Spring Festival
description.schinese: 在春节特别篇中，完成新年囧事并留在家中陪父母。

description.english: Finishing the new year embarrassment and play poker with friends in Spring Festival
description.schinese: 在春节特别篇中，完成新年囧事并跟朋友一起玩抽王八。

description.english: Finishing the new year embarrassment and eating barbecue with friends in Spring Festival
description.schinese: 在春节特别篇中，完成新年囧事并请朋友吃烧烤。

description.english: Making an adventure trip with friends again in Spring Festival
description.schinese: 在春节特别篇中，跟朋友一起再次踏上冒险之旅。

description.english: Catching the ghosts successfully then escaping from the tomb in Tomb Exploration
description.schinese: 在墓穴探险中，成功捕获鬼魂再逃出古墓。

description.english: Defeating the crazy scientist and saving the man in Tomb Exploration
description.schinese: 在墓穴探险中，击败疯狂科学家救出黑衣人。

description.english: Using vacuum to lock the ghost in Tomb Exploration
description.schinese: 在墓穴探险中，利用吸尘器封印鬼魂。

description.english: Helping Yang Guo to treat the broken arm and riding the giant sword to leave in Tomb Exploration
description.schinese: 在墓穴探险中，帮助杨过接上断臂，骑乘巨剑离开。

description.english: Bribing the ghost successfully for escaping in Tomb Exploration
description.schinese: 在墓穴探险中，成功贿赂鬼魂喽啰后逃离。

description.english: Finishing all the endings in Tomb Exploration
description.schinese: 完成墓穴探险中所有结局。

description.schinese: 在恐龙逃生（上）中，成功从盗蛋龙手中取回龙蛋。

description.schinese: 完成恐龙逃生（上）中所有结局。

description.schinese: 在恐龙逃生（下）中，成功孵化出蛇颈龙。

description.schinese: 完成恐龙逃生（下）中所有结局。

description.schinese: 在囧游特别篇中，缆车掉进河中。
